summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account, detailing deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and account management instructions. It provides insight into the financial activities associated with the account during April 2017.

keyFacts: The document details account balances for a Deutsche Bank account as of April 30, 2017.
The beginning balance on April 1, 2017, was $963,885.55.
There were service charges totaling $50.00 for the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
A check for $698.00 was paid on April 12, 2017.
